text: I and stage IV thymoma that may be completely removed by surgery includes the following:         - Surgery with or without radiation therapy.    -  Neoadjuvant chemotherapy followed by surgery with or without radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of anticancer drugs in new combinations or doses.    - A clinical trial of new ways of giving radiation therapy.
